entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort Erie
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
